author: talkshizgethit
body: But it’s telling me “Webull does not support trading PTC Bulletin Board or Punk Sheets stocks, warrants, rights or units. This security is not tradable on Webull. You can close out your existing positions, but you cannot open any new positions for this security.”

author: Alternative-Grand-77
body: True Biden is big on rail.  However PTC is done. Tier IV should already be priced in and won’t grow their market much.  The idea of electrifying freight lines would increase their business but Amtrak has already purchased new locomotives from Alstom so passenger trains are unlikely to be in Wabtecs future.

author: talkshizgethit
body: I was told this from Webull “Webull does not support trading PTC Bulletin Board or Punk Sheets stocks, warrants, rights or units. This security is not tradable on Webull. You can close out your existing positions, but you cannot open any new positions for this security.”
